00078 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 // Driver "struct", really a virtual base class since we have member function
00080 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 typedef struct
00082 {
00083         //--[Driver info]--------------------------------------------------------
00084         UCHAR *szName;                                          
00085         DRIVER_STATE            eState;                 
00086         DRIVER_TYPE                     eType;                  
00087         //--[Driver functions]---------------------------------------------------
00088         DRIVER_CONSTRUCTOR      pfConstructor;  
00089         DRIVER_START            pfDriverStart;  
00090         DRIVER_STOP                     pfDriverStop;   
00091         DRIVER_CONTROL          pfControl;              
00092         DRIVER_READ                     pfDriverRead;   
00093         DRIVER_WRITE            pfDriverWrite;  
00094 #if KERNEL_USE_MUTEX
00095         //--[Resource protection]------------------------------------------------
00096         MUTEX_STRUCT            stMutex;                
00097         BOOL                            bUseMutex;              
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 } DRIVER_STRUCT;
